mutants.code:
import re

def extract_html_tags(text):
    tags = re.findall('', text)
    unique_tags = sorted(set(tags))
    return ['<' + tag + '>' for tag in unique_tags]

mutants.original_line: return ['<' + tag + '>' for tag in unique_tags]  # Return tags in their opening form
mutants.mutated_line: return ['<' + tag - '>' for tag in unique_tags]

import re

def extract_html_tags(text):
    tags = re.findall('<(\\w+)[^>]*>', text)
    unique_tags = sorted(set(tags))
    return ['<' + tag - '>' for tag in unique_tags]

mutants.original_line: return ['<' + tag + '>' for tag in unique_tags]  # Return tags in their opening form
mutants.mutated_line: return [('<' + tag) * '>' for tag in unique_tags]

import re

def extract_html_tags(text):
    tags = re.findall('<(\\w+)[^>]*>', text)
    unique_tags = sorted(set(tags))
    return [('<' + tag) * '>' for tag in unique_tags]

import re

def extract_html_tags(text):
    tags = re.findall('<(\\w+)[^>]*>', text)

    return ['<' + tag + '' for tag in unique_tags]

mutants.code:
import re

def extract_html_tags(text):
    tags = re.findall('<(\\w+)[^>]*>', text)
    unique_tags = sorted(set(tags))
    return ['' + tag + '>' for tag in unique_tags]
